channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A 'Holy Grail' Sleep Apnea Pill Could Be On The Market Next Year
item.description: Sleep apnea affects as many as 80 million in the U.S. Now Apnimed, the $400 million company behind the first ever pill to treat it, is preparing to fi...

item.title: AI 50 2026: Submissions For Forbes’ List Of The Top 50 AI Startups Is Open
item.description: Forbes’ eighth annual AI 50 list, featuring the most prominent AI startups, is accepting submissions until February 6, 2026.

item.title: LumiMind’s Non-Invasive Brain Computer Interface Is Ready For Its Closeup
item.description: LumiMind debuts real-time non-invasive brain computer interfaces at CES 2026, pairing live gameplay demos with LumiSleep, a consumer EEG device built ...

item.title: These Affordable Rock Lobster IEMs By Apos Are Tuned To Shell Out The Rock And Roll
item.description: These affordable IEMs are tuned for rock music and pack a punch like a prize fighter thanks to the use of a 10mm liquid crystal polymer dynamic driver...

item.title: Mile-Wide ‘Planet Killer’ Asteroid To Flyby Earth Today — What To Know
item.description: A mile-wide asteroid known as 2005 UK1 will safely pass Earth on Jan. 12, 2026, at 32 times the moon’s distance, posing no danger to the planet.
